mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basic_gasq_eshop( id, name, seller_id, publish, status, freeze_status, business_status, version, code, third_part, is_support_open_platform, open_platform_key ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sellerId}, #{publish}, #{status}, #{freezeStatus}, #{businessStatus}, #{version}, #{code}, #{thirdPart}, #{isSupportOpenPlatform}, #{openPlatformKey} )
mapper.update: UPDATE basic_gasq_eshop SET name = #{name}, seller_id = #{sellerId}, publish = #{publish}, status = #{status}, freeze_status = #{freezeStatus}, business_status = #{businessStatus}, version = #{version}, third_part = #{thirdPart}, is_support_open_platform = #{isSupportOpenPlatform}, open_platform_key = #{openPlatformKey} WHERE code = #{code}
